Package com.deco2800.game.entities.components

Class InteractionComponent

java.lang.Object
com.deco2800.game.generic.Component
com.deco2800.game.entities.components.InteractionComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Interactable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdviceActions, BananaPeelActions, BedActions, BookActions, CatActions, DoorActions, DrinkActions, ForeignBedActions, GenericChore, GenericHighlight, GenericToggleHighlight, InteractionControllerComponent, MumActions, PlaceableBoxActions, PlantActions, PuddleActions, ShrubActions, TrashActions, TvActions, WashingDishesActions
public class InteractionComponent
extends Component
implements Interactable
When this entity touches a valid hitbox, enact the unique interaction with them.

Requires HitboxComponent on this entity.

    • create

      public void create()
      Description copied from class: Component
      Called when the entity is created and registered. Initial logic such as calls to GetComponent should be made here, not in the constructor which is called before an entity is finished.

    • toggleHighlight

      public void toggleHighlight​(boolean shouldHighlight)
      Description copied from interface: Interactable
      Called when the object is requested to toggle its highlight. May be extended for multiplayer by checking that the list of colliding player entities is empty.
      Specified by:
      toggleHighlight in interface Interactable
      Parameters:
      shouldHighlight - whether the render component should change to a highlighted variation or not
